At Domainsatcost.com we have been offering reliable and affordable hosting services since 2006, from our in house Datacenter located in New Jersey, USA.

Providing everything from Domain Registrations to Dedicated Servers.

Our OpenVZ VPS plans start at only $5.00 a month and if you sign up today you can be eligible to get a 10% recurring discount.

**OpenVZ Starter**  
2 CPU Cores  
RAM - 768 MB  
Disk Space - 30 GB  
Bandwidth - 1000 GB  
Port speed - 100 Mbit  
Regular price $5/m = today only for $4.50/m

No Setup or hidden Fees, 99.99% guaranteed uptime, 24/7 live support (English and Spanish), No contract necessary and Free Migration.

For further information visit: http://domainsatcost.com/  
Email: sales@domainsatcost.com, julie.griffith@domainsatcost.com
